Name: Car Looper
About the game: Car Looper is a tricky and challenging puzzle experience. You are the manager of a racetrack and have to build looping tracks before the time runs out. Use different tiles to avoid obstacles and create the longest track possible! Try your puzzle solving skills in one of two different game modes: In exploration mode you have no timelimit to create your track. You can try to perfect your track and get the best score possible without the ticking clock! In time mode it is all about speed! Try to build your track while the clock is ticking down!
